item.description:
Hey Metro North members -- it's time for another Sunday Social with the Boston Cards and Conversation group!

We'll be meeting at Bruegger's in Melrose for some games, coffee and conversation... what more could you ask for? :)  Our first event was a smashing success, so we plan on doing these on a regular basis.

Laurel will be your host this afternoon. She would love to play some cards with you :)

So come join us!  And bring your favorite card or board game -- they're all welcome!

HOW TO GET THERE

We'll be meeting at Bruegger's Bagel Bakery in Melrose. This location has nearly everything you could ask for in a location... space to play, free parking, food and drink, and not-too-crowded restrooms.

By Subway: MBTA will be on a Sunday schedule. Make sure to check for any shuttle announcements or other service advisories. Take the Orange Line to Oak Grove and take the 136 bus. This will drop you off in downtown Melrose a couple building from the event location. You can take the 137 bus back to Oak Grove.

Bus 136 schedule: http://mbta.com/schedules_and_maps/bus/routes/?route=136
Bus 137 schedule: http://mbta.com/schedules_and_maps/bus/routes/?route=137

By Car: Melrose is easily accessible from Rt. 93, Rt. 1 and Rt. 28. Bruegger's is in the heart of downtown Melrose, located on Main Street. Plenty of free parking is available behind the building.
item.name: Sunday Social @ Bruegger's - Cards, Games and More!
